item.description:
Try fun Games & Activities like the Bunny Hop, an Egg Hunt, or Duck Duck Bunny! Enter a FREE raffle to win a Pet Easter Basket. Special Treat for Pets who come dressed in their Easter Best and join the Pet Parade!
Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.why: Where is Spring Hiding?! I think we need to coax it out into the open with some FUN spring weather games. So if your dog likes to Chase, Wrestle, Jump, Race, Tug, Fetch, Catch or Chew up Toys come Play with Us!
item.name: Celebrate Easter with your Favorite Pooch!
